      public Card()

  • Method Details

    • ConfirmTargetPlayer

      public Boolean ConfirmTargetPlayer(GameStack stack)
      Used to confirm what targets a card will select, if it needs any. Adds them to the array currentTargetIds, which stores the stack ids of the cards on that stack its targeting.
      Parameters:
      stack -
      Returns:

    • Play

      public void Play(GameStack stack)
      This is the actual cards effect.
      Parameters:
      stack -

    • SetValid

      public void SetValid(Boolean value)
      Used to make the card valid or invalid, used by the Nope card to cancel the effect of another card. If a card is not valid, the stack will not call its play method.
      Parameters:
      value -

    • ClearTargets

      public void ClearTargets()
      Removes all targets from the card, used in the refresh method.

    • Refresh

      public void Refresh()
      Will basically reset this card to a blank copy of itself. Should be used whenever the card is put into a hand.

    • CheckValid

      public Boolean CheckValid()
      Checks if the card is valid, meaning whether or not it can resolve.
      Returns:

    • SetStackId

      public void SetStackId(int value)
      Sets the cards stack id, done by the stack. Currently unimplemented.
      Parameters:
      value -

    • GetStackId

      public int GetStackId()
      Returns:
      The card's stack Id. Currently unimplemented
